preference.name: IMM_MATERIAL_SEARCH_ALL_TYPES_GROUPS
preference.preference_description: Defines the groups which users are allowed to select all search types described under the preference "IMM_MATERIAL_SEARCH_TYPE". Users from a group not listed in this preference will have to search by 'Last Material Revision with status'. Valid Values: * no value or "all": all search object types are available for every user in any group. * "group_full_name": This must be the full name to any group added to the list.
